A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Made me miss the prequels...how is that possible? Everyone has their own opinions\, I was bored most of the movie\, not what I wanted. Didn't feel like a Star Wars movie at times. The movie did a disservice to the old characters while rushing story lines with the new. Very disappointed.  I agree\, it is time for the Jedi to end based on this new trilogy. Force Awakens at least left mystery and intrigue\, this new film was a let down.  Even the opening scene was rushed with the scrolling words explaining nothing\, just there to be signature. Horrible movie\, wish I had waited until Netflix to see it.
